mangaName: I Shaved. Then I Brought a High School Girl Home
alternativeNames:
Hige Wo Soru. Soshite Joshikosei Wo Hirou.
Me afeité la barba. Y luego recogí a una colegiala.
Я побрился. Затем привёл старшеклассницу домой.
ひげを剃る。そして女子高生を拾う。
author: Shimesaba
description: ’Yoshida was swiftly rejected by his crush of 5 years. On his way home after drinking his sorrows away, he saw a high school girl sitting on the street. "I will let you do it with me, so let me stay". "Don't even joke about something like that". And so, the story of living with the high school girl Sayu began. The slice-of-life romance story between a runaway high school girl and a 26 year old salaryman ensues.’
